title: Pathfinder: Identification of axonal- and synaptic-protection mutants using real-time confocal microendoscopy
abstractText: Publication of the findings will be via the normal channels of peer-review in journals and scientific conferences. After publication, the results will be disseminated in public lectures and public access web pages. Details of phenotype will be published on line in the Harwell mutagenesis database (htttp://mgu.har.mrc.ac.uk/mutabase) as soon as the founder lines are identified.
